alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 27 at 11:26AM CDT until April 07 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Tennessee...Arkansas...Mississippi...Missouri... Mississippi River at Memphis Mississippi River at Caruthersville Mississippi River Above Tiptonville Mississippi River at Osceola Mississippi River at Tunica Mhoon Landing ...The Flood Advisory is extended for the following rivers in Missouri...Tennessee...Arkansas... Mississippi River at Caruthersville For the Lower Mississippi River...including Tiptonville, Caruthersville, Osceola, Memphis, Tunica Mhoon Landing, Helena... elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY, APRIL 07... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Osceola. * WHEN...Until Friday, April 07. * IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, In Arkansas, water is going over the north side of Craighead Point. The pumphouse area for the power plant south of Osceola is flooded. In Tennessee, Lauderdale County Road 924 begins to flood, isolating a house on Island 34. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Monday the stage was 18.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Friday morning to a crest of 29.0 feet Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday evening. - Action stage is 24.0 feet. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
